acceptance_criteria: Submitting a DEPOSIT with blank price succeeds and records the entry.
tests(required): vitest: TransactionsTab cash submission allows blank price
planned_diff_hint: Relax price validation for cash-only transaction types and hide price input when not needed in TransactionsTab.

acceptance_criteria: Triggering fetchPrices failure leaves previous values on screen and shows a visible error message.
tests(required): vitest: App renders error toast and retains prior holdings on fetchPrices failure
planned_diff_hint: Add error boundary/toast for price fetch failures and cache last successful holdings values.

acceptance_criteria: Submitting with an invalid key shows a descriptive inline error without raw URL and includes the request ID.
tests(required): vitest: PortfolioControls surfaces friendly error with request ID
planned_diff_hint: Map backend error codes to user-facing copy in PortfolioControls and render request ID token.

acceptance_criteria: After forcing a 500 from /returns/daily, the UI shows an error banner and labels fallback ROI data.
tests(required): vitest: App labels ROI fallback mode on error
planned_diff_hint: Detect ROI fallback path, display alert with request ID, and annotate chart labels.

acceptance_criteria: Either a Reports importer exists with preview/confirm or README/docs explicitly remove the workflow.
planned_diff_hint: Document actual supported import/export flows in README and ReportsTab copy until importer ships.

acceptance_criteria: With defaults, Admin tab refreshes metrics/events automatically about every 15 seconds.
planned_diff_hint: Introduce polling hook honoring VITE_ADMIN_POLL_INTERVAL_MS for AdminTab metrics/events.

acceptance_criteria: Clicking “Export security events” downloads CSV with events/metadata.
tests(required): vitest: AdminTab export button emits CSV with events
planned_diff_hint: Add CSV builder using fetchSecurityEvents data and wire to AdminTab export control.

acceptance_criteria: Saving then loading on another device restores currency/compact/hide-balance choices.
tests(required): vitest: SettingsTab persists preferences via portfolio payload
planned_diff_hint: Persist settings on backend payload and hydrate on load with integration test doubles.

acceptance_criteria: Portfolio with deposits no longer issues /prices/undefined requests in network log.
planned_diff_hint: Filter falsy symbols before calling fetchPrices and add regression test.

acceptance_criteria: Downloaded performance CSV contains portfolio, SPY, blended, ex-cash, and cash columns.
tests(required): vitest: reports CSV builder includes benchmark series
planned_diff_hint: Extend performance CSV builder to append SPY, blended, ex-cash, and cash series.

acceptance_criteria: After nightly job sets stale_price=true, UI highlights the stale status.
tests(required): vitest: AdminTab renders stale price alert
planned_diff_hint: Pipe stale_price flag through API response and render alert chip in AdminTab.
